organization.$: Laboratory of Micro Inertial Instrument and Advanced Navigation Technology
School of Instrument Science and Engineering
Sichuan Institute of Piezoelectric and Acoustooptic Technology

head.abstracts: An embedded integrated GPS/MIMU/compass navigation system was developed based on FPGA and DSP. The system hardware consists of quartz MEMS gyroscope, flexible quartz accelerometers, GPS receiver, digital magnetic compass, FPGA, DSP-based high-speed navigation computer modules and etc. The strapdown navigation algorithm, adopting coning correction quaternion calculation and sculling compensation, and extended Kalman filter with 18 state variables, containing sensor noise model, are introduced in the integrated algorithm. Inertial sensors and MIMU navigation information are used to control the quality of GPS and magnetic compass signals. Experimental testing of the integrated system was performed in land vehicle. Results show that the horizontal attitude error is less than 0.2°, head error is not larger than 0.3°, and positioning error is within 3 meters.

organization.$: Laboratory of Micro Inertial Instrument and Advanced Navigation Technology
